exceptions.tactic: intros m x z Hmap Hsucc Hexdz Hxz m0.

original: simpl. intros m x z Hmap Hsucc Hexdz Hxz m0. destruct (MA0.expo_dec m x z Hmap) as [Hexpo | Hexpo]. - rewrite Hexpo. reflexivity. - simpl. unfold m0. rewrite bottom_L_B_top_bot. + reflexivity. + apply Hsucc. + apply Hexdz. + apply Hxz.
